00055 /*
00056  * Hold write_lock for o.
00057  */
00058 int mdd_acl_chmod(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *o, __u32 mode,
00059                   struct thandle *handle)
00060 {
00061         struct lu_buf           *buf;
00062         posix_acl_xattr_header  *head;
00063         posix_acl_xattr_entry   *entry;
00064         int                      entry_count;
00065         int                      rc;
00066 
00067         ENTRY;
00068 
00069         buf = mdd_buf_get(env, mdd_env_info(env)->mti_xattr_buf,
00070                           sizeof(mdd_env_info(env)->mti_xattr_buf));
00071 
00072         rc = mdo_xattr_get(env, o, buf, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS);
00073         if ((rc == -EOPNOTSUPP) || (rc == -ENODATA))
00074                 RETURN(0);
00075         else if (rc <= 0)
00076                 RETURN(rc);
00077 
00078         buf->lb_len = rc;
00079         head = (posix_acl_xattr_header *)(buf->lb_buf);
00080         entry = head->a_entries;
00081         entry_count = (buf->lb_len - sizeof(head->a_version)) /
00082                 sizeof(posix_acl_xattr_entry);
00083         if (entry_count <= 0)
00084                 RETURN(0);
00085 
00086         rc = lustre_posix_acl_chmod_masq(entry, mode, entry_count);
00087         if (rc)
00088                 RETURN(rc);
00089 
00090         rc = mdo_xattr_set(env, o, buf, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS,
00091                            0, handle);
00092         RETURN(rc);
00093 }
00094 
00095 int mdd_acl_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00096                 struct lu_attr *la, const struct lu_buf *buf, int fl)
00097 {
00098         struct mdd_device       *mdd = mdd_obj2mdd_dev(obj);
00099         struct thandle          *handle;
00100         posix_acl_xattr_header  *head;
00101         posix_acl_xattr_entry   *entry;
00102         int                      rc, entry_count;
00103         bool                     not_equiv, mode_change;
00104         mode_t                   mode;
00105         ENTRY;
00106 
00107         head = (posix_acl_xattr_header *)(buf->lb_buf);
00108         entry = head->a_entries;
00109         entry_count = (buf->lb_len - sizeof(head->a_version)) /
00110                 sizeof(posix_acl_xattr_entry);
00111         if (entry_count <= 0)
00112                 RETURN(0);
00113 
00114         LASSERT(la->la_valid & LA_MODE);
00115         mode = la->la_mode;
00116         rc = lustre_posix_acl_equiv_mode(entry, &mode, entry_count);
00117         if (rc < 0)
00118                 RETURN(rc);
00119 
00120         not_equiv = (rc > 0);
00121         mode_change = (mode != la->la_mode);
00122 
00123         handle = mdd_trans_create(env, mdd);
00124         if (IS_ERR(handle))
00125                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(handle));
00126 
00127         /* rc tells whether ACL can be represented by i_mode only */
00128         if (not_equiv)
00129                 rc = mdo_declare_xattr_set(env, obj, buf,
00130                                 XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS, fl, handle);
00131         else
00132                 rc = mdo_declare_xattr_del(env, obj, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS,
00133                                 handle);
00134         if (rc)
00135                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00136 
00137         if (mode_change) {
00138                 la->la_mode = mode;
00139                 la->la_valid = LA_MODE;
00140                 rc = mdo_declare_attr_set(env, obj, la, handle);
00141         }
00142 
00143         rc = mdd_trans_start(env, mdd, handle);
00144         if (rc)
00145                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00146 
00147         mdd_write_lock(env, obj, MOR_TGT_CHILD);
00148         /* whether ACL can be represented by i_mode only */
00149         if (not_equiv)
00150                 rc = mdo_xattr_set(env, obj, buf, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS, fl,
00151                                    handle);
00152         else
00153                 rc = mdo_xattr_del(env, obj, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS, handle);
00154         if (rc)
00155                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00156 
00157         if (mode_change)
00158                 rc = mdo_attr_set(env, obj, la, handle);
00159 
00160         /* security-replated changes may require sync */
00161         if (S_ISDIR(mdd_object_type(obj)))
00162                 handle->th_sync |= !!mdd->mdd_sync_permission;
00163 unlock:
00164         mdd_write_unlock(env, obj);
00165 stop:
00166         mdd_trans_stop(env, mdd, rc, handle);
00167 
00168         RETURN(rc);
00169 }
00170 
00177 int __mdd_fix_mode_acl(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_buf *buf,
00178                        __u32 *mode)
00179 {
00180         posix_acl_xattr_header  *head;
00181         posix_acl_xattr_entry   *entry;
00182         int                      entry_count;
00183         int                      rc;
00184 
00185         ENTRY;
00186 
00187         head = (posix_acl_xattr_header *)(buf->lb_buf);
00188         entry = head->a_entries;
00189         entry_count = (buf->lb_len - sizeof(head->a_version)) /
00190                       sizeof(posix_acl_xattr_entry);
00191         if (entry_count <= 0)
00192                 RETURN(0);
00193 
00194         rc = lustre_posix_acl_create_masq(entry, mode, entry_count);
00195 
00196         RETURN(rc);
00197 }
00198 
00199 #endif
00200 
00201 /*
00202  * Hold read_lock for obj.
00203  */
00204 static int mdd_check_acl(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00205                         const struct lu_attr *la, int mask)
00206 {
00207 #ifdef CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL
00208         struct lu_ucred  *uc  = lu_ucred_assert(env);
00209         posix_acl_xattr_header *head;
00210         posix_acl_xattr_entry *entry;
00211         struct lu_buf   *buf;
00212         int entry_count;
00213         int rc;
00214         ENTRY;
00215 
00216         buf = mdd_buf_get(env, mdd_env_info(env)->mti_xattr_buf,
00217                           sizeof(mdd_env_info(env)->mti_xattr_buf));
00218         rc = mdo_xattr_get(env, obj, buf, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS);
00219         if (rc <= 0)
00220                 RETURN(rc ? : -EACCES);
00221 
00222         buf->lb_len = rc;
00223         head = (posix_acl_xattr_header *)(buf->lb_buf);
00224         entry = head->a_entries;
00225         entry_count = posix_acl_xattr_count(buf->lb_len);
00226 
00227         /* Disregard empty ACLs and fall back to
00228          * standard UNIX permissions. See LU-5434 */
00229         if (entry_count <= 0)
00230                 RETURN(-EAGAIN);
00231 
00232         rc = lustre_posix_acl_permission(uc, la, mask, entry, entry_count);
00233         RETURN(rc);
00234 #else
00235         ENTRY;
00236         RETURN(-EAGAIN);
00237 #endif
00238 }
00239 
00240 int __mdd_permission_internal(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00241                               const struct lu_attr *la, int mask, int role)
00242 {
00243         struct lu_ucred *uc = lu_ucred(env);
00244         __u32 mode;
00245         int rc;
00246         ENTRY;
00247 
00248         if (mask == 0)
00249                 RETURN(0);
00250 
00251         /* These means unnecessary for permission check */
00252         if ((uc == NULL) || (uc->uc_valid == UCRED_INIT))
00253                 RETURN(0);
00254 
00255         /* Invalid user credit */
00256         if (uc->uc_valid == UCRED_INVALID)
00257                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00258 
00259         /*
00260          * Nobody gets write access to an immutable file.
00261          */
00262         if (mask & MAY_WRITE && la->la_flags & LUSTRE_IMMUTABLE_FL)
00263                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00264 
00265         LASSERT(la != NULL);
00266 
00267         mode = la->la_mode;
00268         if (uc->uc_fsuid == la->la_uid) {
00269                 mode >>= 6;
00270         } else {
00271                 if (mode & S_IRWXG) {
00272                         if (role != -1)
00273                                 mdd_read_lock(env, obj, role);
00274                         rc = mdd_check_acl(env, obj, la, mask);
00275                         if (role != -1)
00276                                 mdd_read_unlock(env, obj);
00277                         if (rc == -EACCES)
00278                                 goto check_capabilities;
00279                         else if ((rc != -EAGAIN) && (rc != -EOPNOTSUPP) &&
00280                                  (rc != -ENODATA))
00281                                 RETURN(rc);
00282                 }
00283                 if (lustre_in_group_p(uc, la->la_gid))
00284                         mode >>= 3;
00285         }
00286 
00287         if (((mode & mask & S_IRWXO) == mask))
00288                 RETURN(0);
00289 
00290 check_capabilities:
00291         if (!(mask & MAY_EXEC) ||
00292             (la->la_mode & S_IXUGO) || S_ISDIR(la->la_mode))
00293                 if (md_capable(uc, CFS_CAP_DAC_OVERRIDE))
00294                         RETURN(0);
00295 
00296         if ((mask == MAY_READ) ||
00297             (S_ISDIR(la->la_mode) && !(mask & MAY_WRITE)))
00298                 if (md_capable(uc, CFS_CAP_DAC_READ_SEARCH))
00299                         RETURN(0);
00300 
00301         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "permission denied, mode %x, fsuid %u, uid %u\n",
00302                la->la_mode, uc->uc_fsuid, la->la_uid);
00303 
00304         RETURN(-EACCES);
00305 }
00306 
00307 int mdd_permission(const struct lu_env *env,
00308                    struct md_object *pobj, struct md_object *cobj,
00309                    struct md_attr *ma, int mask)
00310 {
00311         struct mdd_object *mdd_pobj = NULL;
00312         struct mdd_object *mdd_cobj;
00313         struct lu_ucred *uc = NULL;
00314         struct lu_attr *pattr = NULL;
00315         struct lu_attr *cattr = MDD_ENV_VAR(env, cattr);
00316         int rc = 0;
00317         ENTRY;
00318 
00319         LASSERT(cobj);
00320         if (pobj != NULL) {
00321                 mdd_pobj = md2mdd_obj(pobj);
00322                 pattr = MDD_ENV_VAR(env, pattr);
00323                 rc = mdd_la_get(env, mdd_pobj, pattr);
00324                 if (rc)
00325                         RETURN(rc);
00326         }
00327 
00328         mdd_cobj = md2mdd_obj(cobj);
00329         rc = mdd_la_get(env, mdd_cobj, cattr);
00330         if (rc)
00331                 RETURN(rc);
00332 
00333         /* For cross_open case, the "mask" is open flags,
00334          * so convert it to permission mask first.
00335          * XXX: MDS_OPEN_CROSS must be NOT equal to permission mask MAY_*. */
00336         if (unlikely(mask & MDS_OPEN_CROSS))
00337                 mask = accmode(env, cattr, mask & ~MDS_OPEN_CROSS);
00338 
00339         rc = mdd_permission_internal_locked(env, mdd_cobj, cattr,
00340                                             mask & ~MAY_RGETFACL,
00341                                             MOR_TGT_CHILD);
00342 
00343         if (unlikely(rc == 0 && (mask & MAY_RGETFACL))) {
00344                 if (likely(!uc))
00345                         uc = lu_ucred_assert(env);
00346 
00347                 if (cattr->la_uid != uc->uc_fsuid &&
00348                     !md_capable(uc, CFS_CAP_FOWNER))
00349                         rc = -EPERM;
00350         }
00351 
00352         RETURN(rc);
00353 }
